Articles.Content: Right now I have a contract to explore the lonely space potato, but then again there is this video:
So? In every save i send missions to Dres. Science is science (and money) .
this video is incredible. the accent makes it better
Space Potato is good. There is great, amazing Canyons and there are nearby asteroids too. Dres is relevant and is top priority for colonization, and is most Kerbinlike planet in the Kerbol System.

Why would you not go there? I'll admit that I don't fly out there much (granted I haven't done much with KSP recently), but it's relatively easy science/money. It's not too hard to get to, or to land on due to the low (but not excessively so) gravity. Plus, they added asteroids to make it more interesting.

Ehh, may be boring, but i got a mission headed there as it is, about a year left in its journey, than the return trip, or the attempt to return, since its a flyby craft, and an error made it waste fuel since it was carrying oxidizer when the nerv engine doesn't use oxidizer anymore.
